item.title: Christmas Tree 2025 Advent Calendar Drops Even Lower Than Prime Day, Practically Free While LEGO Sales End
item.content:encoded:
Hear those sleigh bells? Unlikely, because these are just words on a screen and December is still two months away. I know. The weather finally started to begin feeling like Fall, and here I am already talking about Winter. However, that makes now the perfect time to start planning for the holidays. You can your family can begin to celebrate at the start of the holiday season with this 2025 advent calendar of a Christmas tree building set. It’s made with interlocking, plastic toy bricks similar to that one Danish toy company that’s been around forever. You know the one. This isn’t from them, but it is the same premise and right now the building brick set is on sale for 35% off. That discount has brought the price down from $46 to just $30 — the lowest price its been in the past 30 days. That’ll end up saving you a whole $16.

See at Amazon

This advent calendar comes with 24 boxes which you or someone you gift it to can open up and put together daily. Each box is numbered in order from one to 24, inside containing a layer of the Christmas tree along with a cute decoration to be added to the tree with it. When you open up the box, you might find a cute little teddy bear, maybe a choo choo train, could be a stocking, or perhaps even Santa Clause himself.

When Christmas arrives, you’ll have a charming toy Christmas tree standing over 10 inches tall and containing over 1,100 pieces. A detailed manual guide is included to follow along with each day’s new build. also included with the set is an miniature LED string light which you can wrap around the finished build so it glows like a real Christmas tree.

Fun for the Whole Family

The advent calendar Christmas tree building block set makes for a wonderful stocking stuffer for girls, boys, teenagers, adults, practically anyone whole loves a fun little knick-knack. It can also make for a fun activity the whole family can partake in all of December. This can help inspire creativity and imagination among young children, strengthen you parent-child relationship with your kids. It’s a good excuse to do a little something together each day and that’s what the holiday season is all about.

Even though Amazon’s huge Fall savings event — Prime Big Deals Days — has ended, it’s not too late to save on something interesting and fun. Grab yourself or a loved on the 2025 advent calendar building block set for $16 off today.
